articles.title: Aldi selling TikTok viral health drink for just £1.49 as shoppers hail it ‘amazing'
articles.author: Nawal Abdisamad
articles.summary: Aldi launched Original and Strawberry Matcha Lattes in UK stores on July 24th. The product gained popularity after a TikTok post by GQ Jordan, showcasing various recipes using the powdered drink. This launch follows other Aldi products that have become popular due to TikTok trends, highlighting Aldi's strategy of leveraging social media for product promotion.

articles.title: Pixel Fold Pro: Google's Most Important Foldable Yet?
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Google's Pixel 10 Pro Fold is rumored to feature IP68 dust and water resistance, a potential breakthrough for foldable phones. The device is also expected to have larger, brighter displays, a slightly larger 5015mAh battery, and enhanced software features.

articles.title: 38 Low-Effort Cleaning Products For A Spotless Home
articles.author: Jonathan Mazzei
articles.summary: The article features multiple cleaning products designed for convenience and efficiency. The products range from self-cleaning brooms and toilet cleaning systems to robotic window cleaners, power scrubbers, and vacuum mop combos. The tools aim to simplify various cleaning tasks around the house by incorporating advanced technology and innovative design.

articles.title: Pokemon Fan Gives Mega Dragonite a Gen 5 Style Makeover
articles.author: Game Rant
articles.summary: Pokemon Legends: Z-A announced Mega Dragonite, the first official new Mega-Evolved Pokemon.

articles.title: Harry Styles Teams Up With 'Dildo Duchess' for New Line of Sex Toys
articles.summary: Pleasing, Harry Styles' beauty brand, is launching a new line of sexual wellness products called "Pleasing Yourself." The collection includes a double-sided vibrator designed in partnership with Zoë Ligon and a silicone lubricant. The collection will be available starting July 25 at Pleasing.com, with a pop-up shop in New York City to support the launch.

articles.title: 11 Best AirPods Case Covers to Protect Your Investment
articles.author: Jessica Dukes
articles.summary: AirPods 4 are considered the best earbuds on the market. AirPods case covers offer personality and protection for the charging case. These covers are available for AirPods 4 and older models, with features like drop protection and sleek designs.

articles.title: Trump wants you to have your choice of Cokes — and not much else
articles.author: Matt Bai
articles.summary: Coca-Cola is producing its flagship soda with cane sugar as an alternative to the high-fructose corn syrup version. This provides consumers with a choice between the standard Coke and a version similar to imported 'Mexican Coke'.

articles.title: Lidl's £7.99 Middle Aisle buy will save you hundreds on a new summer wardrobe next year – and it's perfect for delicates
articles.author: Fabulous Digital Writer
articles.summary: Lidl is launching several new products. These include the Philips Fabric Shaver for £7.99, a dupe for the Ninja SLUSHi Frozen Drink Maker for £19.99 (Lidl Plus members) or £24.99, the Salter 9L VertiCook View Air Fryer as a dupe for the Ninja Double Stack 2-Drawer Air Fryer for £79.99, and the Parkside Wet & Dry Vacuum Cleaner.

articles.title: Dyson's new supersonic hair dryer is worth the price tag
articles.author: mercnews
articles.summary: Dyson is launching the Supersonic Nural, an upgraded version of its hair dryer, featuring smart tech that learns heat and speed preferences, detects when it's put down, and auto-adjusts airflow. Dyson's Airwrap, a 6-in-1 multi-styler, also has Bluetooth capabilities and connects to the Dyson app for personalized styling preferences.

articles.title: The Galaxy Z Fold 7 is even making Apple loyalists look sideways
articles.author: YINON BEN SHUSHAN
articles.summary: Samsung's Galaxy Z Fold 7 represents a significant advancement, evolving from an 'expensive tech experiment' into a 'complete, sleek, and impressive smartphone'.

articles.title: Gelato is the house specialty at new Mississauga dessert shop
articles.author: Steve Pecar
articles.summary: Nani's Gelato, a dessert specialty shop, has opened its second Mississauga location. The shop is known for its gelato, which offers a unique texture and intense flavor due to its lower fat content and denser texture. The newest location is at 215 Lakeshore Road West, Unit 4, in Port Credit.

articles.title: From Krypton to Convention: Old Spice and DC Make a 'Fresh Landing' at San Diego Comic-Con
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Old Spice is launching the new Old Spice x Superman Collection, a limited-edition lineup of grooming essentials featuring a Bright Citrus & Cosmos scent. This launch is being celebrated at San Diego Comic-Con alongside the release of DC Studios' 'Superman' movie.

articles.title: Orange County Startup Takes Aim at Customer Service's Biggest Problems: Hold Times, Offshore Staff, & After-Hours Gaps
articles.author: info@kalkinemedia.com
articles.summary: Andru AI delivers a free, custom-tailored AI-powered voice assistant prototype within 24 hours. This service aims to improve customer service experience.

articles.title: Serta Simmons Bedding Launches Serta® iSeries NXG™ Collection
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Serta Simmons Bedding (SSB) launched the new Serta® iSeries NXG™ mattress collection, featuring technologies like MaxCold ™ Cover, Carbon Fiber Memory Foam, and Serta's All-New NXG ™ Memory Foam. The iSeries NXG™ line is offered in four comfort levels with each level available in an all-foam or hybrid construction and is designed to deliver cooling, pressure relief and support at accessible premium price points. The Serta® iSeries NXG™ Collection is available in twin – king models, as well as an all-new split-head option (available in queen and king sizes).

articles.title: Serta Simmons Bedding Launches Serta® iSeries NXG™ Collection
articles.author: Joplin Globe
articles.summary: Serta Simmons Bedding launched the new Serta iSeries NXG mattress collection. This next-generation mattress is engineered to provide immediate cooling, instant pressure relief, and ideal support. The collection is positioned at accessible premium price points.

articles.title: Canoe Daily Deal: Get a free sleep bundle with a Casper mattress
articles.author: Kate Mendonca
articles.summary: Casper is offering a limited-time deal where shoppers who purchase a Casper Dawn, Atlas Hybrid, or the original Casper Mattress receive a free signature sleep bundle. Shoppers who purchase an Original Hybrid, Snow Mattress, or Wave Hybrid Snow Mattress will receive a free cooling bundle instead.

articles.title: Microsoft Just Released A Major Android App Upgrade For Windows 11 PCs
articles.author: David Phelan
articles.summary: Microsoft has upgraded its 'Link to Windows' app, offering a connected PC experience hub.  The updated app allows users to lock their PC from their Android phone, check PC battery life and Wi-Fi status, send files, mirror the phone screen, and access recent PC files and clipboard items. This new experience is rolling out and requires specific versions of Windows Insider Preview, Phone Link, and the Link to Windows app.

articles.title: Foldable phones are impressive technological marvels but come with serious compromises
articles.summary: Samsung has released the seventh generation of its Galaxy Z Fold and Flip phones. Google introduced the Pixel Fold, while Motorola launched the Razr+. The Galaxy Z Fold 7 features a 7.6-inch inner screen and a 6.2-inch outer screen, whereas the Flip 7 has a 6.7-inch screen when open and a 3.4-inch mini display on the outside. Google's Pixel Fold features a wider front screen. Apple is rumored to be testing foldable iPhones for a potential 2026 release.

articles.title: I Never Want My Shower to End Thanks to These Luxurious Body Washes
articles.author: Brooke Knappenberger
articles.summary: Glossier revamped its Body Hero wash with a new Sandstone scent, mirroring the notes in their newly launched body mists. Nécessaire introduced a leveled-up body wash, while Cyklar launched an oil-infused body gel. Other brands such as Phlur, Bvlgari, Jo Malone, Oak Essentials and Sothys offer body washes with unique fragrances and beneficial ingredients.

articles.title: How AI Headshots Are Helping Job Seekers Stand Out in 2025
articles.author: Amber Smith
articles.summary: AI-generated headshots are introduced as a quick, budget-friendly alternative to traditional photography, allowing job seekers to create professional images for online platforms. These AI tools analyze features and allow customization, offering benefits like affordability, speed, and remote accessibility.

articles.title: Walmart's AI Agents: Automating Content Creation and More
articles.author: Daniel Foster
articles.summary: Walmart is leveraging 'agentic AI' by using AI agents. Walmart is upgrading Sparky, an AI-powered digital assistant, to actively execute tasks such as creating weekly essential product orders based on established shopping habits and curating multi-item orders for events.

articles.title: Google's new AI shopping features let you try on clothes and track better deals
articles.author: Abhinav Kaustubh
articles.summary: Google is launching new AI-powered shopping features, including a virtual try-on tool available across Search, Google Shopping, and Google Images, and upgraded price alerts that allow users to specify size, color, and maximum price. Additionally, Google will introduce AI-generated style inspiration for outfits and room designs this fall.

articles.title: Call of Duty Mobile Season 7 upcoming crossover, Operators, new game mode, and more
articles.author: Global Sports Desk
articles.summary: Activision is launching Season 7 'Phantom Current' for Call of Duty Mobile on July 30, 2025. The new season features a collaboration with Girls' Frontline including lucky draws and bundles, introduces the Gulag from PC and console versions, and adds the Mini Mayhem multiplayer mode with RC-XD car racing.

articles.title: Is AI the Future of Branding? Key Insights for Business Owners
articles.author: Provided Amber Smith
articles.summary: AI tools like Looka and SurgeGraph are introduced as aids in branding, focusing on logo design and content creation. These tools help businesses automate and enhance various aspects of branding, from visual identity to content strategy. The integration of AI aims to improve brand consistency, personalization, and data-driven insights, enabling companies to evolve and remain competitive.

articles.title: Dyson's new supersonic hair dryer is worth the price tag
articles.author: Mobile Web
articles.summary: Dyson is releasing the Supersonic Nural, an upgraded version of its Supersonic hair dryer, featuring smart tech that learns user preferences and auto-adjusts airflow. The article also mentions other Dyson hair tools, including the Corrale straightener with flexing copper plates, the Airwrap i.d. multi-styler with Bluetooth connectivity, and the Supersonic r, a lighter and more powerful hair dryer designed to reduce frizz.

articles.title: DKNY floral perfume 'smells lovely' and could be yours for £5
articles.summary: DKNY is offering new scents like Be Delicious Fresh Blossom, Coconuts About Summer, and Be Extra Delicious, available at retailers such as Superdrug, Boots, Amazon, and The Fragrance Shop. Superdrug offers DKNY Fresh Blossom for £20, with a Topcashback offer reducing the price, while other DKNY scents are available at varying prices across different retailers.

articles.title: This incredible ice cream machine is the summer essential you'll regret not buying
articles.author: Cailey Lindberg
articles.summary: Ninja is selling the Ninja Swirl soft serve and ice cream machine for $350. The Swirl features 13 one-touch programs and six soft serve programs. Ninja also offers a Personalize Your Thirsti Bundle for $180, which creates still and sparkling drinks with over 25 customizable flavors.

articles.title: Firm launches pink my salon to empower women in hair business
articles.author: The Nation
articles.summary: Lush Hair, a leading Nigerian hair brand, has launched 'Pink My Salon,' a new CSR project. This initiative transforms small roadside salons into modern beauty spaces, aiming to empower women in the hair business.

articles.title: Google Shopping's AI-Powered Boost for Back-to-School Shopping
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Google is launching an AI-powered virtual try-on feature across Google Search, Google Shopping, and Google Images, allowing users to upload a photo and see how clothes look on them. This feature works with billions of apparel items, aiming to bridge the gap between online browsing and in-person fitting.

articles.title: I dreaded my morning alarm - until I tried this stylish clock that actually helps me sleep
articles.author: Nishka Dhawan
articles.summary: Loftie has introduced the Loftie Clock, a sleep product designed with a two-phase alarm, natural sounds, and a gentle in-built light. The clock offers customizable alarm settings, a preloaded sound library, and a gentle glow feature, enhancing the user's sleep experience.

articles.title: Wayvia Ushers in New Era of AI-Driven Omnicommerce with Commerce Intelligence Engine
articles.author: Wayvia
articles.summary: Wayvia, formerly PriceSpider, launches with a new AI-driven commerce vision and introduces Wayvia MCP, an AI infrastructure built for accessing live product and market data. Wayvia MCP gives AI agents direct access to commerce data, aimed at empowering brands in the evolving commerce landscape.

articles.title: Wayvia Ushers in New Era of AI-Driven Omnicommerce with Commerce Intelligence Engine
articles.author: Wayvia
articles.summary: Wayvia, formerly PriceSpider, launched with a new product vision focused on AI-driven commerce. The company introduced Wayvia MCP, an AI infrastructure that provides natural language access to product and market data, eliminating the need for manual queries.

articles.title: Beloved German wine returns to local market
articles.author: Jarod Lim
org: Les Grands Chais de France Group
articles.summary: Blue Nun wine brand is relaunching in Malaysia in collaboration with Luen Heng F&B Sdn Bhd (LHFB). The relaunch introduces a new product, Blue Nun Chill Red, along with other wines like Authentic White, Riesling, Gewürztraminer, Merlot, Eiswein and Blue Nun Pink Rosé. The full range will be available in stores starting September 2025.

articles.title: Google Adds More AI Elements to its Product Discovery and Shopping Tools
articles.author: Andrew Hutchinson
articles.summary: Google is launching new AI-powered shopping discovery tools for Google Shopping users in the U.S. The new tools include advanced virtual try-on for clothing, updated price tracking with size and color preferences, and text-based matching for fashion styles using conversational queries.

articles.title: This BAGSMART travel backpack deal comes with compression bags & a toiletry bag — all for under $70
articles.author: Amanda Edelman
articles.summary: BAGSMART offers the Rolling Travel Backpack, a versatile bag with rolling wheels, a retractable handle, and a lay-flat design. This compact bag includes features like a laptop sleeve, outer zip pockets, side pockets, a packing cube, and a clear toiletry bag. It is designed to fit in an overhead bin and is currently on sale.

articles.title: This 'super efficient' cordless vacuum is usually $500 on Amazon, but it's on sale for 73% off — shop it for under $150
articles.author: Melina Brum
articles.summary: MQDXE introduces a Cordless Stick Vacuum Cleaner with powerful suction, a 55-minute runtime, and an anti-tangle brush for $136. The vacuum features HEPA filters, an LED flex head, and a space-saving design. Customer reviews highlight its lightweight design and build quality, noting it's best for hard floors.

articles.title: Cheaper color Kindle on the way
articles.author: Rob Beschizza
articles.summary: Amazon is launching a new, less expensive Kindle Colorsoft 16 GB model priced at $249.99, featuring a high-contrast Colorsoft display and extended battery life. Additionally, the Kindle Colorsoft Kids version, priced at $269.99, includes one year of Amazon Kids+, a kid-friendly cover, and parental controls. These new devices offer easy-on-the-eyes color displays.

articles.title: Want to be a leader? Start where the system breaks — Bill Gates just showed students how
articles.author: TOI Education
articles.summary: Bill Gates worked a customer service shift at Phia, his daughter's AI-driven fashion startup. Phia, co-founded by Phoebe Gates and Sophia Kianni, is presented as a sustainability-forward fashion tech platform that utilizes AI to help users compare prices, locate second-hand alternatives, and reduce their shopping footprint.

articles.title: OpenAI launches ChatGPT Agent that can complete online grocery shops
articles.author: George Nott
articles.summary: OpenAI has launched 'ChatGPT Agent', a new service that can complete complex online tasks like planning and buying ingredients. The agent intelligently navigates websites and allows users to transition from conversation to requesting actions within the same chat. It is currently rolling out to users with Pro, Plus, and Team subscriptions.

articles.title: The Viwoods AiPaper E-Ink Notebook Isn't Kidding About the 'AI' Part
articles.author: Joel Cunningham
articles.summary: Viwoods has launched the AiPaper, a new e-ink notebook available in two sizes (10.65-inch and 8.2-inch). The AiPaper features an integrated LLM chatbot and is priced around $540, positioning it competitively against similar products from Boox, reMarkable, and Supernote.

articles.title: Book lovers can pick up a cheaper 16GB Kindle Colorsoft as new device launches
articles.author: Christopher Harper
articles.summary: Amazon's Kindle has released a new, more affordable Kindle Colorsoft with 16GB of storage, priced at £239.99 and including three months of Kindle Unlimited. They have also launched a kids' version of the Colorsoft at £259.99, featuring an illustrated cover, one year of Amazon Kids+, and a two-year worry-free guarantee.

articles.title: YouTube Shorts Just Got Smarter: AI Now Turns Your Photos into Viral-Ready Videos
articles.summary: YouTube Shorts has launched new AI-powered tools, including an image-to-video AI generator that converts still images into dynamic short videos. They are also introducing AI-powered visual effects that adapt in real-time, enhancing visibility and removing noise. These new tools democratize AI by bringing high-end capabilities to content creators.

articles.title: Only 3 features are missing from Amazon's cheaper Kindle Colorsoft
articles.author: Craig Donaldson
articles.summary: Amazon has expanded its Kindle Colorsoft lineup with a new 16GB model priced at $250 and a Kindle Colorsoft Kids version costing $270. The Kindle Colorsoft Kids includes age-appropriate features, illustrated covers, and a one-year Amazon Kids+ subscription and is available now.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold7 launch sees £200 discount frenzy a day before release
articles.author: Christopher Harper
articles.summary: Samsung launched the Galaxy Club, a payment program enabling customers to pay for new Galaxy phones over 24 months with a 10% deposit. The company also released the Galaxy Z Fold7 and Z Flip7, with pre-order deals available, starting at £44.99 per month for the Z Fold7 with double storage.

articles.title: Qubrid AI Redefines GPU Cloud with Pre-Built AI Templates, Seamless Developer Workflows and Flexible GPU Rentals
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Qubrid AI has launched new features on its GPU Cloud Rental Platform. The update includes Ready-to-Deploy One-Click AI/ML Templates, a flexible developer interface supporting SSH, Jupyter Notebooks, and VS Code, and expanded GPU rental options, including short-term and long-term plans. This update aims to streamline AI workflows and make GPU accelerated computing more accessible.

articles.title: Sky's £13 Google Pixel 9a may steal shoppers away from the Pixel 10
articles.author: Jake Hackney
articles.summary: Google is preparing to launch its Pixel 10 series, including the Pixel 10, Pixel 10 Pro, Pixel 10 XL, and Pixel 10 Pro Fold at the Made By Google Event in August. Sky Mobile is offering a deal on the Pixel 9a, which includes AI features powered by Google Gemini, an IP68 rating, and a Tensor processor.

articles.title: Google AI Mode will generate fake clothes to help you buy real ones
articles.author: verge
articles.summary: Google is introducing generative AI features into its online shopping experience, including AI Mode which will generate images of outfits and decor ideas based on user descriptions. Additionally, a new tool will allow users to virtually try on clothes. The AI Mode shopping feature is slated to launch this fall in the US.

articles.title: I Asked A Machine To Find My Signature Scent — & It Might've Nailed It
articles.author: Rebecca Fearn
articles.summary: EveryHuman introduced Algorithmic Perfumery, a service using AI to create unique fragrances tailored to individual preferences. The process involves an online questionnaire and personalized scent vials, with options for scent coaching and tweaking the formulas. This service aims to democratize fragrance creation, allowing users to create a personal scent.

articles.title: These Noyz Body Mists Are So Unique — & Linger On Your Skin All Day
articles.author: Venus Wong
articles.summary: Noyz has launched a new collection of body mists, offering a more affordable and wearable alternative to their eaux de parfum. The collection features scents like 'Listen, Honey,' 'Salty Hair & Body Fragrance Mist,' and 'Juicy Chaos,' each with unique notes and staying power, priced at $42.

articles.title: Outfitting The Laundry Room with A Front Load Versus A Top Load Washing Machine
articles.author: Community News Releases
articles.summary: AjMadison experts recommend top washing machine brands, including Miele's WWD660WCS front load washer with TwinDos and Soft Steam, Electrolux front load washers with SmartBoost, and LG's AI-driven washers with Wi-Fi. For top load washers, Speed Queen is noted for its durability, Whirlpool for its flexibility with a removable agitator, and GE Appliances for its smart features and competitive pricing.

articles.title: REVIEW: Hyundai Tucson 2. 0D N-Line not as sporty as it looks, which is a good thing!
articles.author: Jason Woosey
articles.summary: Hyundai has released a facelifted version of the Tucson, including the N-Line flagship model. The updated Tucson features design enhancements such as a new front grille, rear bumper, and redesigned interior with a dual-screen infotainment system. The N-Line is powered by a 2.0-litre turbodiesel engine and includes features like a sporty body kit and driver assistance systems.

articles.title: 31 Products On Amazon's 'Internet Famous' List With Before-And-Afters That Look Like Straight Up Witchcraft
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: Amazon features an "Internet Famous" section with TikTok-viral products including Laneige's Neo Blurring Powder, Catrice "Instant Awake" Under Eye Brightener, and Clinique Almost Lipstick Tinted Lip Balm. Other products highlighted include Good Molecules Yerba Mate Wake Up Eye Gel, Jergens Natural Glow Firming Self Tanner Body Lotion, E.l.f's Lash Xtndr Tubing Mascara and Power Grip Primer, Garnier Fructis Sleek & Shine Anti-Frizz Serum, K18's Leave-In Molecular Hair Mask, Differin Acne Treatment Gel, and PanOxyl Antimicrobial Hydrating Acne Creamy Wash which have received positive reviews.

articles.title: Varun Dhawan's 'Baby John' to finally have world television premiere
articles.summary: Varun Dhawan's action thriller "Baby John", produced by Jio Studios, Atlee, A For Apple Studios, and Cine 1 Production, will have its World Television Premiere on Zee Cinema on July 27th. The film, also starring Keerthy Suresh and Wamiqa Gabbi, features a mix of comedy and action.

articles.title: 3 New Google AI Features To Improve Online Shopping
articles.author: Chris Smith
articles.summary: Google has launched three new AI-powered shopping features: 'try it on', 'track price', and 'vision match'. The 'try it on' feature allows users to virtually try on clothes by uploading a photo of themselves. The 'track price' feature lets users track the price of items in Google's Shopping Graph and receive notifications when the price drops. 'Vision match' enables users to search for clothing using natural language descriptions.

articles.title: Google's AI-Powered Virtual Try-On for Online Shopping Is Now Live
articles.author: Imad Khan
articles.summary: Google has launched 'Try On,' an AI-powered virtual clothing try-on feature in Google Search, expanding it from Labs users to a wider audience. Additionally, Google Search introduces 'Price Alerts,' a shopping feature that notifies users when the price of a desired item meets their specified budget. These AI-driven enhancements aim to improve the shopping experience within Google Search.

articles.title: Google's new AI feature lets you virtually try on clothes
articles.author: Aisha Malik
articles.summary: Google is launching a new AI feature that enables users to virtually try on clothes by uploading their photos. Additionally, Google is rolling out updated price alerts where users can specify desired spending amounts. The company also teased an upcoming feature leveraging generative imagery for shoppable outfits and room design inspiration, set to launch this fall.

articles.title: Google AI Mode will generate fake clothes to help you buy real ones
articles.author: Jess Weatherbed
articles.summary: Google is launching new AI-powered features to enhance its online shopping experience. The upcoming AI Mode generates outfit and decor ideas based on user descriptions. Additionally, a virtual try-on tool is rolling out, allowing users to see how clothes look on themselves by uploading a photo.

articles.title: Amazon is launching a cheaper color Kindle
articles.author: Jay Peters
articles.summary: Amazon is expanding its Kindle Colorsoft lineup by introducing two new models: a cheaper 16GB version priced at $249.99 and a Kindle Colorsoft Kids bundle for $269.99. The kids-focused bundle includes a 16GB Colorsoft, a special cover, and a one-year subscription to Amazon Kids Plus.

articles.title: Amazon launches surprise new Kindle but the price will shock you
articles.author: Henry Burrell
articles.summary: Amazon has launched two new Kindle e-readers: a 16GB version of the Kindle Colorsoft and the Kindle Colorsoft Kids. The Colorsoft features a color screen, adjustable warm light, and access to the Kindle bookstore, while the Colorsoft Kids includes a year's subscription to Amazon Kids+ and a protective case. Both models are available for purchase on Amazon now.

articles.title: Google's new AI feature lets you virtually try on clothes
articles.author: News Feed Editor
articles.summary: Google has launched a new AI-powered virtual try-on feature that allows users to upload their photo and virtually try on clothes. Additionally, Google is rolling out updated price alerts and planning a feature for exploring shoppable outfits using generative imagery. The virtual try-on feature is available in the United States.

articles.title: If Nobody Has Told You About These 53 Cheap Swaps For More Expensive Products Yet, Please Allow Me
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: Eos launched a limited edition Eos Marshmallow Super Balm lip treatment. Gold Bond introduced firming neck and chest cream. Hawaiian Tropic released SPF 30 Mineral Powder Sunscreen Brush. Lottabody designed Coconut Oil Foaming Curl Mousse. Catrice launched Instant Awake Under Eye Brightener. E.l.f. released Sheer For It Blush Tint and Lash XTNDR Tubing Mascara and Squeeze Me More Lip Balm Duo and Halo Glow Liquid Filter. L'Oreal Paris launched Infallible 3-Second Setting Spray Mist. Monday Haircare released Dry Shampoo. Olay introduced Firming Body Lotion. Mise En Scene launched Perfect Serum. Pavoi launched gold-plated station necklace. The Face Shop introduced Rice Water Bright Foaming Facial Cleanser. Essence launched Drop of Sunshine Bronzing Drops. Beachwaver launched B1 Rotating Curling Iron.

articles.title: monday.com Ltd. (MNDY): A Bull Case Theory
articles.author: Ricardo Pillai
articles.summary: Monday.com continues product innovation with the launch of features like portfolio reporting, AI-powered insights, and Monday Code Platform, enabling third-party agent integrations. The AI strategy is gaining traction, with AI actions growing 150% YoY to 26 million. The Work OS platform serves ~245,000 customers across 200+ industries.

articles.title: Vertesia Platform Now Available in the New AWS Marketplace AI Agents and Tools Storefront
articles.author: Vertesia
articles.summary: Vertesia, a provider of enterprise generative AI solutions, has made its unified, low-code GenAI platform available in the new AI Agents and Tools storefront in AWS Marketplace. This launch allows AWS customers to discover, buy, and deploy Vertesia's platform more easily, accelerating AI agent and agentic workflow development.

articles.title: Next £36 dress with 'boho' touch guarantees 'many compliments'
articles.author: Husna Anjum
articles.summary: Next is selling the "Mid Blue Puff Sleeve Mini 100% Cotton Dress" for £36, featuring a looser fit, mini length, pure cotton material, boho detailing, short puff sleeves, and a V-Neck collar. Marks & Spencer offers the "Pure Cotton Textured Mini Waisted Dress" for £35, featuring a collared neckline, long cuffed sleeves and an invisible button-through front.

articles.title: How to Buy New Orleans Saints Alternate Gold Jerseys: Shop New 2025-26 NFL Gear
articles.author: Ben Verbrugge
articles.summary: The New Orleans Saints have launched new gold alternate jerseys for the upcoming NFL season. These jerseys and related gold merchandise are available for purchase, including "Nike Gameday Golds" featuring various players. The new jerseys are expected to be popular among fans.

articles.title: All the Middle of Lidl kitchen bargains launching TODAY – including £2.49 tool to keep veg fresh & £8.99 John Lewis dupe
articles.author: Hana Carter
articles.summary: Lidl is launching a range of new kitchen and home products as part of its 'Middle of Lidl' offers. These include the Silvercrest Sandwich Toaster (£8.99), Silvercrest Slushy Maker (£19.99), Silvercrest Kettle (£10.99), Livarno Shelving Unit (£14.99), Livarno Home Vegetable and Fruit Containers (£2.49), and Decor 880ml XL Travel Tumbler (£9.99), all available in stores now.

articles.title: Make The Most Of Late Summer With These 41 Products
articles.author: Heather Braga
articles.summary: Hawaiian Tropic introduced SPF 30 Mineral Powder Sunscreen Brush designed for scalp sun protection. Burt's Bees launched After Sun Soother lotion with aloe and coconut oil for sunburn relief. Neutrogena released Hydro Boost Body Moisturizing Gel Cream, a light, non-greasy formula for skin hydration. Touchland unveiled Vanilla Velvet Power Essence Hydrating Body and Hair Fragrance. Oxo's compact Brew Rapid Brewer that'll have anyone wondering. Ninja introduced Swirl machine to make soft serve ice cream as well as frozen yogurt, frozen custard, sorbet, milkshakes, and scooped ice cream.

articles.title: Amazon's Best-Selling Robot Lawn Mower Is on Sale
articles.author: Toni Sutton
articles.summary: The Navimow Segway i105N Robot Lawn Mower is available for purchase on Amazon. This device is designed to maintain lawns up to one-eighth of an acre, connects via Bluetooth and Wi-Fi, and features AI for obstacle detection and edge mapping. Other robotic lawn mowers such as the Ecovacs Goat A2500 Robot Lawn Mower, Redkey Mgc1000 Robot Lawn Mower, and Anthbot Robot Lawn Mower are also available on Amazon.

articles.title: ChatGPT Can Now Shop And Build Slides As OpenAI Pushes Task Automation
articles.author: Anisha Sircar
articles.summary: OpenAI is launching new agent features for ChatGPT, enabling it to perform multistep tasks like online shopping and presentation creation.  These features, initially for Pro, Plus, and Team subscribers, leverage tools like Operator and Deep Research to automate workflows from product discovery to checkout, with a Shopify integration in development. OpenAI is also exploring commission-based revenue models for purchases made through ChatGPT.

articles.title: The Google Pixel 10 leak looks exactly the same at the Pixel 9, and I think that's great
articles.author: Spencer Hart
articles.summary: Google has previewed the Pixel 10, which appears visually similar to the Pixel 9 Pro, featuring the same design and triple-lens camera setup. The Pixel 10 series is expected to include Pixel 10, Pixel 10 Pro, Pixel 10 Pro XL, and Pixel 10 Pro Fold models, with color options such as Obsidian, Porcelain, Moonstone, and Jade. Google's launch event is scheduled for August 20.

articles.title: National Day face-off: Which fast-food chain nailed its limited-edition offering?
articles.summary: Guzman y Gomez introduced the Laksa Barramundi Burrito Bowl, featuring barramundi fillets with laksa sauce. McDonald's launched the Chilli Crab Sauce Prawn Burger with a prawn patty and chilli crab sauce. KFC offered the Chilli Crab Mantou Zinger, pairing a Zinger fillet with chilli crab sauce and fried mantou. Long John Silver's presented the Chilli Crab Alaska Pollock Mantou Burger. Burger King featured the Rendang Tendergrill Chicken Burger with rendang sauce.

articles.title: China's Luckin Coffee opens first stores in New York. Can they take on Starbucks on home ground?
articles.summary: Luckin Coffee has opened its first stores in New York. The company aims to compete with Starbucks in the US market.

articles.title: Zizzi is offering Northampton residents the chance to bag free ice cream if the temperature hits 29C
articles.author: Digitial Contributor
articles.summary: Zizzi is giving away free ice cream sundaes when the temperature hits 29°C. The sundaes are part of Zizzi's limited edition summer special guests, which are available to order à la carte, or as part of the Summer Set Menu.

articles.title: IFF Introduces ENVIROCAP™, a Breakthrough Scent Delivery Technology for Fabric Care
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: IFF has launched ENVIROCAP™, a sustainable scent delivery system for fabric care that is ECHA-compliant, biodegradable, and vegan-suitable. This innovation uses a proprietary biopolymer to deliver long-lasting fragrance while reducing environmental impact, aiming to meet consumer demand for sustainability and enhance the laundry experience.

articles.title: IFF Introduces ENVIROCAP™, a Breakthrough Scent Delivery Technology for Fabric Care
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: IFF launched ENVIROCAP™, a sustainable scent delivery system for fabric care that is ECHA-compliant, biodegradable, and vegan-suitable. The new product aims to provide long-lasting fragrance while reducing environmental impact and meets consumer demand for sustainable choices.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7 Review: Foldable Flagship Raises Bar
articles.author: Sahil Mohan Gupta
articles.summary: Samsung has introduced the Galaxy Z Fold 7, a foldable smartphone with a thinner and lighter design, improved hinge mechanism, and enhanced displays. It features a 6.5-inch cover screen and an 8-inch main display with a reduced crease. The device boasts a 200-megapixel main camera and is powered by the Snapdragon 8 Elite for Galaxy processor.

articles.title: Samsung dishes out Galaxy Z Flip7 with free storage but there's only hours left
articles.author: Nisha Mal
articles.summary: Samsung launched its Galaxy Z Flip7, offering a double-storage pre-order deal. The device features a redesigned cover screen, enhanced battery life, Galaxy AI integration, and a 50MP camera with ProVisual Engine. The Galaxy Z Flip7 is available for purchase at £1,049 or via monthly installments.

articles.title: New Mazda CX-5 confirmed for South Africa in 2026: first local details released
articles.author: Jason Woosey
articles.summary: Mazda South Africa has confirmed the local launch timing for the third-generation CX-5 in the second half of 2026. The initial local versions will feature a 2.5-litre normally aspirated petrol engine, with potential mild hybrid versions to follow later. The new model boasts increased interior space, an updated Human Machine Interface, and an optional 15.6-inch touchscreen in overseas markets.

articles.title: New Bedford, Dartmouth Free Laundry Day at Dash Laundromat
articles.author: chrisarsenault
articles.summary: Dash Laundromat is celebrating the soft opening of its new 6,000 square foot location in New Bedford with a Free Laundry Day. The new location features large-capacity washers, free Wi-Fi, TVs, and TouchTunes, offering customers a new laundromat experience.

articles.title: Rinse, Repeat, Rejoice: SouthCoast Gets Free Laundry Day This Sunday
articles.author: Gazelle Gazelle Published:
articles.summary: Dash Laundromat is celebrating the soft opening of its new location in New Bedford, the largest laundromat in the SouthCoast, with its 3rd Annual Free Laundry Day. The new location features amenities like free Wi-Fi, 85-inch TVs, and TouchTunes, enhancing the customer experience.

articles.title: Google tests shopping-style ads in Gmail Promotions tab
articles.author: Bestmediainfo Bureau
articles.summary: Google is testing a new ad format in Gmail's Promotions tab, transforming it into a mini shopping destination. This format showcases products with images, names, prices, and promotional labels, aiming to enhance product discovery and drive purchasing behavior within Gmail. iRobot and Wybot pool cleaners are among the first to display listings in the comparison-style carousel.

articles.title: OnePlus Nord 5 review: A feature-packed mid-range contender with flagship ambitions
articles.author: Noel Campion
articles.summary: The OnePlus Nord 5 has been introduced in the sub-€500 category. It features a 6.83-inch OLED screen with 144Hz refresh rate, Snapdragon 8s Gen 3 chipset, and a 50MP main camera. The phone runs on OxygenOS 15 and is priced at €449.

articles.title: Bagel shop opening in Asheville with classic, hand rolled styles, flavors: What to know
articles.author: Tiana Kennell
articles.summary: Jersey South Bagel Co. is launching its first brick-and-mortar store in Asheville in August. The shop will offer classic Northeast-style bagels, including everything, poppyseed, and onion, as well as specialty sandwiches and seasonal bagels made with local ingredients. The menu includes a French toast bagel and eventually breakfast bagel sandwiches.

articles.title: This Viral Spin Mop Is Now Under $30 at Walmart, and Shoppers Say It's a 'Huge Upgrade' When Cleaning the House
articles.author: Michael Charboneau
articles.summary: Sugarday Spin Mop and Bucket is available for \$29 at Walmart. This mop features a compact circular mop head, telescoping handle and a pedal-activated wringer. Walmart shoppers are raving about the mop due to ease of use and cleaning power.

articles.title: TikTok video gave Holliston candy company a viral business boost. Here's how
articles.author: Caroline Bunnell
articles.summary: Pure Sugar Candy, founded by Stacey Marks Nectow, offers handcrafted candies, including the popular "Bubs." The company innovates with new flavors and themes, and sells its products, including flavored candy cubes and lollipops, online via its website and TikTok shop. A viral video featuring Bethenny Frankel significantly boosted the company's visibility and sales.

articles.title: Toxic Lyrikali To headline Kenya Cane Lemon & Ginger Launch In Thika
articles.author: Soko Directory Team
articles.summary: Kenya Cane is launching a new flavor, Lemon & Ginger, on July 26th, 2025, at the MKU Pavilion Grounds in Thika. This new variant blends lemon and ginger to create a modern twist on a classic Kenyan spirit, targeting dynamic and adventurous consumers. The launch event will feature music, food, culture, and fashion.

articles.title: Bill Gates, with over ₹1000000 crore net worth, works as customer support in this company
articles.author: Ayushmann Chawla
articles.summary: Phia, a fashion-tech startup, launched a browser extension and mobile app utilizing AI to compare prices across 40,000 online stores and highlight eco-friendly options. Bill Gates supported the launch by working a customer service shift.

articles.title: Tesla's humanoid robot delights guests by serving popcorn
articles.author: Elon Musk
articles.summary: Tesla launched its diner and supercharger station in Los Angeles, where the Optimus robot is serving popcorn to customers. The diner features a retro-futuristic design, food containers shaped like the Cybertruck, and a menu curated by chef Eric Greenspan. This could be the first of many such locations.

articles.title: Glo Introduces Device Protection For Subscribers
articles.author: New Telegraph
articles.summary: Globacom, a digital solutions provider, has launched a new Device Protection service in Nigeria, in partnership with Cubecover. This service protects mobile devices against screen and water damage, offering up to N50,000 worth of screen repairs or replacement for a premium starting at N50 per day.

articles.title: Harry Styles fans are convinced the star's brand Pleasing is launching a VERY naughty product after cryptic clip
articles.author: HANNAH MCDONALD
articles.summary: Harry Styles' brand, Pleasing, is anticipated to launch a new product line. Fans speculate that the new products will be adult toys, including vibrators and lubricants. The launch is scheduled for July 25 and will be available online and in person at 251 Elizabeth Street, NYC.

articles.title: 50MP କ୍ୟାମେରା ସହ ଲଞ୍ଚ ହେଲା iQOO Z10R ସ୍ମାର୍ଟଫୋନ; ଦାମ 20 ହଜାରରୁ କମ୍‌
articles.author: ETV Bharat
articles.summary: iQOO has launched its new smartphone, the iQOO Z10R, in the Indian market. The phone is equipped with a MediaTek Dimensity 7400 processor, a 50MP camera, and a curved display. It is priced under ₹20,000, with sales starting on July 29th at ₹17,499.

articles.title: Azizi Developments Advances Digital Transformation With New Customer-Focused IT Solutions
articles.summary: Azizi Developments is accelerating its digital transformation by launching a custom-built customer service application to enhance response speed, a unified mobile app consolidating functionalities for homeowners, and a new enterprise-wide communication system built on Avaya. Additionally, Azizi has implemented SAP to lay the foundation for AI-driven operational excellence.

articles.title: Best front load washing machines in 2025 for energy saving and deep cleaning
articles.author: Amit Rahi
articles.summary: The article highlights various front load washing machines from brands like Samsung, LG, Bosch, IFB, Godrej, and Panasonic, offering details such as AI-powered features, energy efficiency, wash programs, and special technologies like EcoBubble, Direct Drive, and i-Sense. These models offer various capacities and features to cater to different household needs and preferences, enhancing cleaning performance and energy savings.

articles.title: Taobao Thailand posts 60% jump in user registration thanks to localized app
articles.author: Vn Express
articles.summary: Alibaba's Taobao launched a localized Thai version of its app in May, resulting in a 60% jump in new user registrations within a month. During the 618 shopping festival, the platform experienced strong sales in Thailand, particularly in categories like clothing, home furnishings, and consumer electronics.

articles.title: Fortune blends monsoon nostalgia and tech with interactive ‘pakoda pack'
articles.author: Bestmediainfo Bureau
articles.summary: Fortune Soyabean Oil has launched a limited-edition 'Monsoon Special Pack' featuring interactive packaging with augmented reality (AR) and artificial intelligence (AI) elements. The new pouch pack features a QR code that unlocks a digital experience, allowing users to create shareable, customized images using AR and AI. Rain-reactive hoardings have also been installed to reveal imagery of steaming pakodas when it rains.

articles.title: AMD Ryzen Laptops Get Stable Diffusion 3.0 AI Acceleration
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: AMD is enabling faster and higher-quality AI image generation on Ryzen laptops through optimized support for Stable Diffusion 3.0. The integration leverages Ryzen CPUs and Radeon GPUs, with specific instructions to boost performance using ROCm. Laptop models such as ASUS ROG Zephyrus G16, Lenovo Legion Pro 7i, HP Omen 16, and Acer Predator Helios 16 are already demonstrating significant performance gains.

articles.title: Best Laundry Franchise in India: Clean Craft's Tech-Led Playbook Sets the Pace
org: Clean Craft Tech solutions Pvt. ltd
articles.summary: CleanCraft, a laundry franchise brand, is introducing new technologies like IoT-enabled washers and a patented Mini Spotting Table 2.0 to enhance service quality and reduce operational costs for its franchisees. The company is also piloting an AI-powered app for personalized wash cycles and automated customer pickups, aiming to lead in India's digital laundry market.

articles.title: Best Lip Balms for Soft Lips
articles.author: Zee Media Bureau
articles.summary: The article introduces several lip balm products. Minimalist Acid Lip Balm exfoliates and repairs lips, while Maybelline Baby Lips Berry Crush adds a subtle pink tint and SPF 20. Nivea Blackberry Shine Lip Balm provides deep berry color and moisturizing care, and MARS Aqua Splash Tinted Lip Balm offers all-day nourishment with a grapefruit hue.

articles.title: Pixel 10 Pro Fold Leak Reveals Fresh Green and Blue Colours
articles.author: Kahekashan
articles.summary: Google's upcoming Pixel 10 Pro Fold will feature new color options, 'Jade' and 'Moonstone', departing from previous neutral shades. The device is rumored to include a larger 6.4-inch cover screen, a bigger battery, a 1TB storage option and dustproof design. Google is expected to unveil the Pixel 10 Pro Fold at its Made by Google event on August 20th.

articles.title: Best Men's Moisturizers
articles.author: Zee Media Bureau
articles.summary: Myntra is offering a selection of new moisturizers, including Nivea Men Dark Spot Reduction Creme, Clinique Moisture Surge Moisturiser, Cetaphil Bright Healthy Radiance Night Cream, and Ponds Super Light Gel. These products target various skin concerns, such as dryness, dark spots, and uneven skin tone, with unique formulations and features suitable for daily use.

articles.title: ‘I went shopping for Aldi's viral candles - and saved hundreds of pounds with their dupes'
articles.author: Sophie Mei Lan
articles.summary: Aldi is introducing affordable 'dupes' of luxury items, including Jo Malone-inspired candles and perfumes priced at £6.75 compared to the original £56.  Lacura, Aldi's skincare line, offers dupes of Liz Earle and Estée Lauder products, while their suncream is presented as a Nivea alternative. Additionally, Aldi is selling travel-size perfumes that are dupes of brands like Prada, Baccarat Rouge, and Miss Dior, priced at £1.99.

articles.title: BYD to roll out first plug-in hybrid pickup
articles.author: Dawn
articles.summary: BYD Pakistan is launching the Shark 6, the country's first plug-in hybrid electric pickup. The Shark 6's engine activates only when needed, ensuring a stress-free experience during long-distance travel. This launch marks a significant step in the local adoption of new energy vehicles (NEVs).

articles.title: OnePlus Nord 5: A solid mid-range phone held back by two missteps
articles.author: Sahil Bhalla
articles.summary: OnePlus has launched the Nord 5, a mid-range smartphone featuring a 6.83-inch AMOLED display, Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 chipset and a 50MP Sony LYT-700 primary camera. It is positioned as a competitor in the ₹30K price range, with strengths in software, battery life, and display quality. The phone's price starts at ₹29,999.

articles.title: Consumer NZ rates laundry detergents out of 100
articles.summary: Consumer NZ's product review revealed that EcoLiving Laundry Detergent Sheets and Re.Stor Laundry Detergent Sheets performed no better than water in stain removal tests. The Warehouse acknowledges the poor performance of its Shotz Laundry Liquid and plans to reformulate the product. Meanwhile, Persil products demonstrated the most effective stain removal.

articles.title: Why ‘brilliant' $6.95 item with 10,000 five-star reviews is flying off shelves (and it's sold at Woolworths)
articles.summary: No Pong has launched two new bicarb-free deodorant scents: Beach Shackin' (eucalyptus and lime) and Midnight Jazz (smoky, gender-neutral). These new scents, along with OG Original and Lime Legend, are available in subtle new matte tins. The deodorant is priced at $9.95 and available online and in select Woolworths stores.

articles.title: Samsung and Liberty announce availability of the new 2025 Galaxy Foldables in Puerto Rico
articles.author: Criticologos
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics and Liberty announced the availability of the new 2025 Galaxy Z Fold7 and Z Flip7 models in Puerto Rico starting July 25th, 2025. Customers can trade in their old phones for credits up to $1,000 towards a Galaxy Z Fold7 or get a Galaxy Z Flip7 with select monthly contract plans.

articles.title: Pixel 10 Leaked: Play Store & All Details
articles.summary: Google is launching the Pixel 10 series, including the Pixel 10, Pixel 10 Pro, Pixel 10 Pro XL, and the Pixel 10 Pro Fold. The Pixel 10 Pro Fold represents Google's significant entry into the foldable phone market, potentially influencing its broader adoption. The phones will come in various colors, including a striking Indigo blue for the standard Pixel 10 and more muted shades for the Pro models.

articles.title: 30 Products Reviewers Say Make Everyday Tasks Easier
articles.author: Daniel Boan
articles.summary: The article introduces several new products available on Amazon, including a Downy wrinkle releaser and fabric freshening spray, a coffee canister with an airtight lid, and a bracelet fastening tool. Additionally, the article highlights a 3-in-1 wireless charger for Apple devices and an iRobot Roomba that vacuums and mops, among other innovative products.

articles.title: How Trump's AI Plan Could Reshape the Future of Small Business
articles.author: Elisabeta Qoku
articles.summary: Trump's A.I. Action Plan aims to accelerate AI development, potentially leading to the introduction of more affordable AI tools for small businesses. These tools could automate tasks, attract customers, and save time. Agencies and startups may offer AI solutions like chatbots and marketing automation, but businesses should carefully evaluate these new technologies for security, reliability, and ethical considerations.

articles.title: Washing clothes with these 3 NZ detergents is like using water, consumer NZ finds, see the best performers
articles.summary: Consumer NZ tested laundry detergents and Restor Laundry Detergent Sheets performed poorly, leading Restor to claim they launched a new formula with added bio-enzymes that was not included in the test. Persil Active Clean Powder topped the list as the most effective brand.

articles.title: 30 Cool, Useful, And Cheap Things From Amazon's 'Most Wished For' Section
articles.author: Daniel Boan
articles.summary: Amazon features several new and trending products. This includes the NeeDoh "Dream Pop" fidget toy, OPI RapiDry Quick Dry Nail Polish, and the Dash single-serve ice cream maker which creates a half-pint of ice cream in 20 minutes. Other products include Skala's Mais Cacho Hair 2-in-1 Conditioning Treatment, the Catrice \"Instant Awake\" Under Eye Brightener, and Bio-Collagen's Real Deep sheet mask.

articles.title: Amazon.ae Prime Day 2025: Your guide to the top deals
articles.author: Neesha Salian
articles.summary: Amazon.ae has announced Prime Day with deals across 30 product categories. Prime members will get discounts on items from Amazon's Global Store, including selections from the US, UK, and Germany, will also be discounted, and can access discounts on Amazon Bazaar, a newly launched in-app shopping experience.

articles.title: 33 TikTok Products With Impressive Results
articles.author: Courtney Lynch
articles.summary: Gold Bond introduced firming neck and chest cream with hydration and elasticity benefits. Laneige launched Neo Blurring Powder for matte skin with hyaluronic acid. Clinique released Almost Lipstick Tinted Lip Balm in Black Honey, offering a lightweight, buildable gloss. The Pink Stuff unveiled "Sqeezy" sponge set for tough cleaning. Catrice launched "Instant Awake" Under Eye Brightener, a tinted concealer with hyaluronic acid and shea butter. Nyx launched Lip IV Hydrating Gloss Serum offering 12 hours of hydration and Pore Filler Targeted Stick which reduces visibility of pores while smoothing skin. Biodance released overnight collagen mask for hydrates bone-dry skin.

articles.title: Algorithm Contest to Tencent: 3 Tech Career Launches
articles.author: Daniel Foster
articles.summary: Tencent's Advertising Algorithm Competition fosters innovation in ad tech by challenging students to develop solutions for real-world problems. Winning solutions, like Zhang Chang's 'freshness' factor and Wang Zhaobing's user behavior sequencing, are integrated into Tencent's ad systems, boosting click-through rates and improving ad delivery. The competition is now focused on generative AI to personalize ads at an unprecedented scale.

articles.title: Blockbuster chimney deals: Save up to 60% on Glen, Faber, Elica and more
articles.author: Amit Rahi
articles.summary: Glen, Faber, Livpure, Elica, Hindware, and Beyond offer various kitchen chimney models. These include features such as filterless technology, auto-clean functions, touch and motion sensor controls, and high suction power ranging from 1200 to 1600 m³/hr. Warranties range from 1 year to 5 years on the product and 7 to 15 years on the motor, depending on the brand and model.

articles.title: Bullfrog appoints Georgia Newton, Mike Ronkoske and Tim Shelley to leadership roles
articles.author: Alisha Buaya
articles.summary: Oxfam and Bullfrog are launching 'ONLY SHAMPOO', a new campaign to address global food inequality. The initiative aims to take action on global food inequality through this new offering.

articles.title: Spotted! BYD Denza B5 Testing in Sydney Ahead of Expected End-of-Year Arrival
articles.author: Ben McKimm
articles.summary: BYD is preparing to launch the Denza B5, a ladder-frame SUV, in Australia, targeting buyers of Ford Everest and Toyota Prado. The Denza B5 features a 31.8kWh Blade battery providing 100km electric range, supported by a 1.5-litre turbo-petrol engine, delivering a combined 505kW power and an acceleration of 0-100km/h in 4.8 seconds, with a price around AUD $80,000.

articles.title: Lovart AI Launches Globally, Promising Agency-Grade Design For $90 A Month
articles.author: Charlie Fink
articles.summary: Lovart AI launched its 'Design Agent' tool, an AI-powered design platform, on July 23rd after a beta phase with over 800,000 users. This tool generates logos, packaging, video, and 3D assets from a single text prompt and targets solo founders, student creators, and marketers. Lovart offers both free and paid tiers for its 'Design Agent' service.

articles.title: Supermodel's Surprisingly Simple Diet: Cutting Out These Two Foods
articles.author: Luis Mendoza
articles.summary: The article highlights a dietary strategy favored by supermodels, which involves eliminating refined sugar and processed foods to minimize inflammation and enhance overall health. This approach emphasizes nutrient-dense, anti-inflammatory foods like lean protein, healthy fats, and non-starchy vegetables. The supermodel diet leads to increased energy, improved digestion, and clearer skin.

articles.title: 50 Products So Revolutionary, You'll Call Them Paul Revere
articles.author: Mallory Mower
articles.summary: Snif introduces Dead Dinosaur perfume with gasoline notes. Shark Tank presents Click & Carry Grocery Bag Carrier lifting up to 80 pounds. Veer designs the Cruiser City, a ride-on wagon with stroller-like handling. Alleyoop launches a 4-in-1 makeup brush including an eyeshadow brush, a blush brush, a brow brush, and a blending sponge.

articles.title: Pure Parima Launches Best-Selling Silken Sateen TENCEL™ Sheet Set in New Summer Shade ‘Mist'
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: A luxury bedding brand is introducing a new color, Mist, to its Silken Sateen TENCEL™ Sheet Set collection. Mist is described as a soft, breathable, and cool blue-gray color, timed for the summer season.

articles.title: Microsoft's phone app can now remotely lock your Windows PC
articles.author: Mark Hachman
articles.summary: Microsoft is adding the ability to remotely lock PCs to its Windows toolkit. The latest update to the Microsoft Link to Windows app on Android enables users to remotely lock their PCs, even when they are not nearby.

articles.title: How To Shop Laneige's New Collaboration With Baskin Robbins
articles.author: Billboard
articles.summary: Laneige has launched a new product, the Lip Sleeping Mask.

articles.title: Lovart AI Launches Globally, Promising Agency-Grade Design For $90 A Month
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Lovart AI has launched globally, providing agency-level design tools utilizing AI agents for under $90 monthly. The platform offers image, video, and 3D output capabilities from a single prompt.

articles.title: These New Balance Running Shoes Are a Super Rare 30% Off, and Shoppers Say They ...
articles.author: The Capital Journal
articles.summary: The author expresses high satisfaction with New Balance (NB) shoes, stating that they are the best NB shoes purchased.

articles.title: Lovart Launches Globally: End-to-End Design Agent Exits Beta, Powered by the World's First AI Creative ...
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: Lovart has launched its AI design and branding Agent publicly after attracting 800,000 beta testers. The Agent delivers branding budgets quickly for less than US$90 per month.

articles.title: I can't quite untangle my feelings on the latest Pokémon game
articles.author: The Escapist
articles.summary: Pokémon announced a new title called Pokémon Friends during the Pokémon Presents showcase on July 22, 2025. This new game seems to include gacha game elements.

articles.title: 3 New Google AI Features To Improve Online Shopping
articles.author: BGR
articles.summary: Google is introducing new AI-powered features to enhance online shopping within Google Search, Google Shopping, and Google Images. These features include 'Try it on,' enabling virtual product try-ons, 'track price,' for price monitoring, and 'vision match in AI Mode,' facilitating visual search and matching.

articles.title: Why is McDonald's India adding ‘protein slice' to its burgers
articles.author: Indian Express
articles.summary: McDonald's is introducing a new protein slice to be paired with their McSpicy.

articles.title: Cheaper color Kindle on the way
articles.author: Boing Boing
articles.summary: Amazon launched the Kindle Colorsoft last year. The product received good reviews despite a manufacturing hiccup.

articles.title: ChatGPT Can Now Shop And Build Slides As OpenAI Pushes Task Automation
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: OpenAI is introducing new AI agent features to its ChatGPT service for paid users. These features enable ChatGPT to browse, compare, and suggest products, as well as assist with tasks like drafting slide decks.

articles.title: Leanne Morgan Was a Stay-at-Home Mom in Tennessee. Now She's the Star of a Netflix Comedy
articles.author: Time Magazine
articles.summary: Leanne Morgan has a new show on Netflix. Netflix is launching a new show.

articles.title: Handheld printer creates edible art on your lattes and pancakes
articles.author: New Atlas
articles.summary: iKoffy is launching the EdiBot, a portable printer designed to create full-color designs on food. This palm-sized device can print any design imaginable, offering a novel way to personalize culinary presentations.

articles.title: Google AI Mode will generate fake clothes to help you buy real ones
articles.author: The Verge
articles.summary: Google is introducing generative AI features into its online shopping experience in Search.  A new AI Mode feature will generate images of outfits and decor based on user descriptions.  Additionally, Google is launching a virtual try-on tool for clothing.

articles.title: MelroseINC Unveils AWS Cloud Storage Performance Results for Video Editing Workflows
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: MelroseINC conducted a proof of concept evaluating Avid NEXIS Cloud Storage in AWS. The evaluation demonstrated that Avid NEXIS Cloud Storage outperformed two leading competitors in a real-world post-production scenario.

articles.title: Colgate to accelerate premiumisation, bring global personal and home care products to India
articles.author: Business Line
articles.summary: The company plans to expand its product portfolio to cater to evolving consumer needs. This expansion includes select global personal and home care offerings.

articles.title: NEW HOLLAND D 1000 midsize bal
articles.summary: NEW HOLLAND offers the D 1000 midsize baler, available in new condition. The baler is priced at $28,700.
